director.name: Lula Buarque de Hollanda Lula Buarque de Hollanda

introduction: The documentary goes through works composed by the musician from Bahia between 1968 and 1987. Gil reveals his worldview and creative power in expansion at the beginning of his career in this turbulent Brazilian historical moment. The film is built from extensive research of archival images and revisits the context of the songs in conversation with the creator himself.
